data.text: @sidchat1 @UN_SDG @RKalapurakal @ChinaAmbUN @Chinamission2un @WuPeng_MFAChina @cidcaofficial @zlj517 @carogazevedo @kanniwignaraja @CCG_org Sir please request the China gov to open the borders for international students. Everyone is suffering #takeUsBackToChina . Plz sir 🙏🏽

@Najmidinn @sidchat1 @UNinChina @UN_SDG @RKalapurakal @ChinaAmbUN @Chinamission2un @WuPeng_MFAChina @cidcaofficial @zlj517 @carogazevedo @kanniwignaraja @CCG_org What you know is not the real Xinjiang and certainly not the real China

@sidchat1 @WaleedAliKhan9 @UN_SDG @RKalapurakal @ChinaAmbUN @Chinamission2un @WuPeng_MFAChina @cidcaofficial @zlj517 @carogazevedo @kanniwignaraja @CCG_org They have Arranged a big event #Olympics2022 but have no plan to save thousands of Int students career. When everything successfully done, now doing propaganda against Ins students. They could cause Covid situation in China. Students are highly educated as compared to Players

@sidchat1 @WaleedAliKhan9 @UN_SDG @RKalapurakal @ChinaAmbUN @Chinamission2un @WuPeng_MFAChina @cidcaofficial @zlj517 @carogazevedo @kanniwignaraja @CCG_org Sir! What was out come these sessions. Only restrictions, no Respect of thousands of Int students. They are destroying their future. Have no plan only lollipops. But! Doubled stranded for students. 
We condemned this type of behaviour by Chinese Govt.

@sidchat1 @UNinChina @UN_SDG @RKalapurakal @ChinaAmbUN @Chinamission2un @WuPeng_MFAChina @cidcaofficial @zlj517 @carogazevedo @kanniwignaraja @CCG_org How can you speak of peace, stability and development when Chinese government is engaged in #UyghurGenocide and rights abuses? Chinese gov’t is casing the inequalities itself by imprisoning innocent Uyghurs who’re living their own lives.
